text: Veena Pandey is an Indian politician who is a former member of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Council. She was Student Union Vice-President at Banaras Hindu University from 1982–83. Veena Pandey has held the post of Uttar Pradesh BJP General Secretary, and is also the national Vice-President of BJP Mahila Morcha. She has been a member of the National Executive of the Bharatiya Janata Party from 2012 until 2015. ==References== Category:Women in Uttar Pradesh politics Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:20th-century Indian women politicians Category:20th-century Indian politicians Category:21st-century Indian women politicians Category:21st-century Indian politicians
title: Veena Pandey
